task.title: How To Use the Epson PowerLite Pro G5650W Projector

taskbody.context:
This task will teach you how to deploy and utilize the large projector screen at the front of the classroom.
Figure 3: Projector Interface
Pictured above is the tablet interface that you will use to project your information, whetever that may be. The power for the projector will be left on.

step.cmd: Plug in the device that will be projected using one of the provided cords (likely HDMI)
Selectthe HDMI setting on the tablet from the list of availible options
Observethe sound setting at the bottom right of the interface, and make sure that the sound is turned to an appropriate level
step.info: Volume only goes to a certain decibel level on the projector, if any of the residents need additional hearing aid equipment, that must be provided by you.

step.cmd: Look up to the projector, and be sure that the screen is projecting properly
step.info: For gaming, there may be a slight delay in playback if a projector is used. We advise that you bring your own high quality HDMI if you are worried about speeds.
